article.aside: Removed the kdata_copy() function in favour of kdata_buffer_alloc(3) and kdata_buffer_copy(3), which quickly copy only the value pairs of their sources. The reason for this removal is the addition of dependant data sources (e.g., the kdata_mean_alloc(3)), which act on structural data sources (such as buckets) that compute values based upon existing value-pairs. Also removed the kdata_array_realloc() function.
